name: The Curse of Rabenstein
overview: We should try to find a place to stay for the night. The horses need a rest. Those were the coachman's last words before he disappeared without a trace. Lost deep in the Black Forest, you soon find out that some things should remain buried forever! The Curse of Rabenstein is a new story by award-winning adventure author Stefan Vogt. Heavily inspired by the masterpieces from Level 9 and enhanced with stunning pixel graphics, this interactive horror will give you the shivers. This release supports NTSC and PAL for C64 and Commodore 16/Plus 4.
